welcome_message_body: "Welcome to McNair, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer and make unforgettable memories. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport is the hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport serves mainly domestic flights operated by United Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport serves mainly international flights operated by various airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Washington Dulles International Airport serves mainly domestic and international flights operated by various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply select the network and follow the prompts to connect.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Terminal A at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport, serving domestic flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B/C
terminals.description: Terminal B/C at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport, serving domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warrenton-Fauquier Airport offers a variety of services for travelers, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and a small selection of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling on private or chartered flights, the private terminal at Warrenton-Fauquier Airport offers a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
